ruleArticles:
<js>
var a='class.module-item';

html=java.getElement(a);

//java.log(html)

if(baseUrl.match(/so/)){
	
	url=baseUrl + source.getVariable() + "-------------.html";
	
	data=java.ajax(url);
	
	//java.log(data)
	
	java.setContent(data);
	
	html=java.getElement(a);
	
	if(data.match("频繁操作")){
		
		java.longToast("请不要频繁操作，搜索时间间隔5秒")
		
		}
		else if(data.match("输入验证码"))
		{
			yzm=java.getVerificationCode("https://www.freeok.vip/index.php/verify/index.html?")
			
	java.log(yzm)
	
	var yzmurl="https://www.freeok.vip/index.php/ajax/verify_check?type=search&verify="+yzm+","+JSON.stringify({"method": "POST","referer":url});
	
	cookie=java.getCookie(yzmurl);
	
	java.log(java.ajax(yzmurl))
	
	url=url+","+JSON.stringify({"cookie":cookie})
	
	java.log(url)
	
	data=java.ajax(url)
	
	//java.log(data)
	
	java.setContent(data);
	
	html=java.getElement(a);
}
  
	}else{html=html}
	html
</js>
ruleContent:
{{@@class.module-tab-item@tag.span@html##span##a}}

{{@xpath://*[@class="module-play-list"]/div##div##ul}} @js: result = result.replace(/([^<]+)<\/span><\/a>/g,'').replace(//g,'')
